data.title: Rygar: The Legendary Adventure details
data.meta_description: Taking place on an Island in the Mediterranean Sea called Argus, Rygar: The Legendary Adventure, tells the tale of a noble warrior determined to save the Princess Harmonia and bring the Island of Argus back to a state of peace. [Tecmo]
data.text:
Description: Taking place on an Island in the Mediterranean Sea called Argus, Rygar: The Legendary Adventure, tells the tale of a noble warrior determined to save the Princess Harmonia and bring the Island of Argus back to a state of peace. [Tecmo]

Platforms:

PlayStation 2

Developer:

Tecmo

Publisher: Tecmo

Genres:
